So I'm a day late...but that's because I waited until the egg dye kits
were=
 on sale

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/ShinsenEasterEggs.jpg

These Shins=
en-Easter Eggs are actually actors in a student film called

I-KE-DIE-YA

w=
hich is not yet complete because I'm still constructing the set (my
refrige=
rator)...as you can tell it is a low budget venture and the
other actors ar=
e marshmellow peeps (which seem to be the favorite
subject for many short f=
ilms).

Wait?  Where's Okita?  Oh don't worry he'll be in the film too.
---=
-----------------------------------------------
Before projects which take =
up to 3 days to complete I do various
brainstorm collages in video/audio fo=
rmat.  For I-KE-DIE-YA I did the
same thing 

[warning! 17.6 mb of audio wi=
th no script]
https://mywebspace.wisc.edu/tnamwong/web/DVDPROMOfinal2.mp3

=
The film makers are students at the Aizu hangakko (domain school)
Nisshinka=
n (they are all 10 years old in 1864 so the movie will
reflect their inexpe=
rience in movie making)...they have big plans for
the movie and are plannin=
g a DVD release already---however they are
being monitored by Aizu's warrio=
r women the Joushitai
(http://www.shinsengumihq.com/WB.htm). 

They make va=
rious obscure references to stuff which will be cut out in
the final versio=
n (just don't worry if it is all confusing).  So all
of a sudden if someone=
 talks about *Teruhime*--then it is because they
are her otaku.  

The disc=
ussion descended into a fanboy chatter fest which seems to
parody every sin=
gle fan discussion of multiple Shinsengumi universes
including (RK and PMK)=
. Like many "serious" fan discussions---it gets
heated and nasty LOL!!!!!!
=

*Incidentally, Teruhime (Matsudaira Teruko) is -not- Matsudaira
Katamori's=
 wife---she was his adoptive (older) sister. In the world of
fiction it is =
fun to have Katamori have a crush on her (after all they
aren't related by =
blood and she was beautiful).  Please direct
questions on Teruhime to Hirot=
ada Tokugawa.
--------------------------------------------------
